name: Inefcted Assault
description:
Infected Assault is a shoot'em up game made for GameDev.tv game jam 2022. Your objective is to destroy all 5 portals placed around the map to stop the invasion. When you kill the enemies they don't die, this is only the beggining, they evolve into more and more powerful creatures. You will have to kill them in order to gain energy that runs out over time. If you ran out of energy or health it's game over.

Controls:
Move: w a s d
Shoot: LMB

All of it was made by me(discord tag Potez#1501)
